review: I actually did not have high expectations for a little device that just plugs into the back of my tv, but I've been pleasantly surprised.  It's so easy to use, even for my kids, and it's so fast.  Much better than the junky Netflix app we have on our Blu-ray player, and it's also replacing our wii for streaming.  The picture is always crystal clear.  I love that I can have a small stick that doesn't take up space like a Roku box would.
